title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the answer with reason

F'(7) = -1.872 or -1.873

Since F'(7) < 0, the traffic is decreasing at t = 7.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer with reason

F'(7) = -1.872 or -1.873

Since F'(7) < 0, the traffic is decreasing at t = 7.

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for the answer with reason

F'(7) = -1.872 or -1.873

Since F'(7) < 0, the traffic is decreasing at t = 7.
